mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users(userno, id, passwd, uname, phone, postal_code, address1, address2, udate, grade) VALUES (user_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{passwd}, #{uname}, #{phone}, #{postal_code}, #{address1}, #{address2}, sysdate, #{grade})
mapper.select: SELECT userno, id, passwd, uname, phone, postal_code, address1, address2, udate, grade FROM users ORDER BY grade ASC, id ASC
